MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH44 postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Manor Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.41PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.22PM on 28th January 2021.
